article.title: Market Research
article.summary: Get access to market research articles that can be used to help exporters plan their foreign trade efforts.
article.content:
Plan your market entry the right way – use market research to learn your product's potential in a given market, the best prospects for success, and the market's business practices before you first export.

Visit the market research library and access more than 100,000 industry and country-specific market reports from trade specialists working in overseas posts.
